content: the lace fan shawl is an elegant triangle shawl mostly done with the feather and fan stitch with the exception of the first 10 row the pattern is crocheted in repeats of 6 row which are very easy to memorize so you won t have to constantly look at the pattern **spring style blog hop** this shawl is part of the spring style blog hop lots of spring style patterns will be featured in the hop and will be available as a free download for 24h on the day of their feature you can either follow the hop here and here or you can get all the patterns at once by getting the bundle with more than 30 amazing patterns including my lace fan shawl the bundle is available here 1 **materials** fingering weight 1 super fine 20 wpi yarn 3 5-mm e-4 usa 9 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yardage** 874-1136 yds 800-1040 m **yarn options** feel free to use sport or dk 3 light yarn but make sure to go up in hook size to see more of my projects and patterns visit me on facebook and instagram here www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 2 www facebook com/raffamusadesigns 3 1 https //raffamusa--itchinforsomestitchin thrivecart com/spring-style-2021-pattern-bundle/ 2 https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs 3 https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns
